title: BLUE NOTE FONT? PLEASE HELP.
content:
anyone know what this typeface is? i love the quote marks as well as the sexy serif tails...anyone know what this typeface is called and where i can purchase/download?

cheers.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20120127063123im_/http:/typophile.com/files/type_5285)
author: HVY RSNL

comments.content: Perhaps a predigital version of [Bodoni Poster Italic](http://web.archive.org/web/20120127063123/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/linotype/bodoni_poster_std_italic/?sample_text=it%E2%80%99s%20time!%E2%80%9D&sample_size=60). Not quite a match.
